Google+ Badge - Particle for Gantry Framework

 Marian Tanase (marian@tanase.it), Andreas Kar (andreas.kar@gmx.at)

Gantry Documentation and Guides in Italian to create professional Joomla Templates!

NOTE: This particle is installed for the Gantry Hydrogen.
If you want to install the particle on a different Gantry template, you must manually copy the two files gplus-badge.yaml and gplus-badge.html.twig to /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles.
The Javascript file is optional.
